column.field: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}_spieler AS PlayerTab WHERE PlayerTab.verein_id = ClubTab.id)
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}_spiel AS MatchesTab WHERE MatchesTab.pokalname = CupTab.name)
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}_cup_round AS RoundsTab WHERE RoundsTab.cup_id = CupTab.id)
